Package controller

Class MainScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This is a Controller class that handles the Main menu screen when this app is opened.

    • Method Detail

      • onActionAddPart

        public void onActionAddPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This method handles the Add Part button. It takes you to the Add Part Screen where you can enter details of the part you are adding.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that activates when user clicks the add Part button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception required for the load method.

      • onActionAddProduct

        public void onActionAddProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method handles the Add Product button. It takes you to the Add Product Screen where you can enter details of the product you are adding.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that activates when user clicks the add Product button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception required for the load method.

      • onActionDeletePart

        public void onActionDeletePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the deleting of a part. When user selects a part and clicks on delete, it deletes the selected part from the inventory.
        Parameters:
        event - Event activates when user clicks on the delete Part button.

      • onActionDeleteProduct

        public void onActionDeleteProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the deleting of a product. When user selects a product and clicks on delete, it deletes the selected product from the inventory if it doesn't have associated parts. If the product has an associated part, It creates and error message telling the user to dissociate the parts first before deleting the product.
        Parameters:
        event - Event activates when user clicks on the delete Product button.

      • onActionExitProgram

        public void onActionExitProgram​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method closes the application. It also confirms the user action before closing the app.
        Parameters:
        event - Event activates when user clicks on the exit button.

      • onActionModifyPart

        public void onActionModifyPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method helps with modifying a selected part. It takes you to the modify part screen.
        Parameters:
        event - Event activates when user selects a part and clicks the modify button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception for the load method.

      • onActionModifyProduct

        public void onActionModifyProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method helps with modifying a selected product. It takes you to the modify product screen.
        Parameters:
        event - Event activates when user selects a product and clicks the modify button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception for the load method.

      • onActionSearchParts

        public void onActionSearchParts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the searching of a part using the search bar, on the main screen. It selects the part when user searches for it using the part id. It filters the parts when searching for it using the part name. It shows error when the part does not exist
        Parameters:
        event - The event activates when user searches for a part using the search bar.

      • onActionSearchProducts

        public void onActionSearchProducts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the searching of the product using the search bar, on the main screen. It selects the product when user searches for it using the product id. It filters the products when searching for it using the product name. It shows error when the product does not exist
        Parameters:
        event - The event activates when user searches for a product using the search bar ont he main menu screen.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method initializes the two tables with dummy data that's entered in the main method.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - url
        resourceBundle - resourcebundle
